text: Emile Gerardus Maria Roemer (born August 24, 1962 in Boxmeer) is a Dutch politician of the Socialist Party (SP). He was political and parliamentary leader from March 5, 2010 until December 13, 2017. His successor is Lilian Marijnissen. He was a member of the Second Chamber from 2006 to 2018. Previously he was an alderman of Boxmeer, and a member of the party board. He was acting mayor of Heerlen from 2018 until 2020, and acting mayor of Alkmaar from 2020 until 2021. He has been King's Commissioner of Limburg since December 1, 2021. Roemer is a former school teacher. == References == * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch mayors Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Dutch teachers Category:Leaders of political parties in the Netherlands Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from North Brabant Category:Socialist Party (Netherlands) politicians
title: Emile Roemer
